ControllerCommon package

ControllerCommon.XboxController module

class ControllerCommon.XboxController.XboxController(controllerNum: int = 0, deadZone: float = 0)[source]

Bases: object

Class used to interface with an XboxController.

async getControllerInput()[source]

Asynchronously retrieves the button id and value of any new inputs from the controller. The function only detects input from a button/axis if its value has changed.

Returns:

A String list containing multiple values from multiple buttons/triggers/joysticks from the controller in the string format: “[Input ID]:[Input Value]n” for easy serial parsing.

getLayout()[source]

Prints the id’s of the buttons and axis of the XboxController that will be returned in getControllerInput()

getRawAxis(axisID: int) → float[source]

Returns the value of a axis

Args:

axisID (int): The id of the axis

Return:

float value of the axis

getRawButton(buttonID: int) → int[source]

Returns the value of a button

Args:

ButtonID (int): The id of the button

Return:

integer value of the button pressed

getRawdPad(dPadID: int) → tuple[int, int][source]

Returns the value of a axis

Args:

d-padID (int): The id of the d-pad

Returns:

A tuple that is in the format (0,0) where the x and y are represent which side of the D-Pad
